EmailTemplate.name: NDA Agreement
EmailTemplate.subject: NDA for {!Account.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Adaptive Insights, Inc. 3350 W. Bayshore Rd. Suite 200 Palo Alto, CA 94303 Office: (650) 528-7500 Fax: (650) 528-7501
Hello,
Attached for your records is a copy of the signed NDA between Adaptive Insights and {!Account.Name}.
Your Adaptive contact will connect with you shortly to discuss next steps.
Regards,
Adaptive Insights, Inc.
